page.title: 16ICKFORD CHURCH
page.content:
Ickford church makes me feel a little bit creepy inside for some reason. It is quite dark inside the church. When I first walk in to the church the first things I see are all the colourful things like the flowers and windows.The candle holders in the church always look nice and shiny. The church is very cold.It looks very old.Some of it dates from Norman times.Parts of the church have been added on since then.The pillars have got all different patterns around them.On one of the window ledges there is a game called Nine men morris which the choirboys used to play.There are three doors leading outside.There is a font near the door which babies get christened in.
By SARAH MITCHENALL & BECKY BAKER
